sentences.sentence: I overate at the party last night and got violent indigestion.
sentences.translation: 我今天晚上吃多了，消化不良。

sentences.sentence: Dementia. Japanese experts have found that 30 to 40 percent of senile dementia patients overate when they were younger.
sentences.translation: 日本有关专家还发现，大约有30%—40%的老年痴呆病人，在青壮年时期都有长期饱食的习惯。

sentences.sentence: Theoretically, those using the monitors might have been so inspired to exercise that they moved a lot, developed large appetites, and overate, blunting any weight loss from the workouts, he says.
sentences.translation: 他说，从理论上说，使用监测仪的那些人可能大受鼓舞，以至大量运动，胃口变大，吃得太多，削弱了锻炼产生的减肥效果。
